front.title: Robust Header Compression (ROHC) over Wireless Ethernet Media ROHCoWEM

abstract.t: This document describes a protocol which supports the use of robust header compression (ROHC) [2] on IP datagrams transmitted over Ethernet and other 'Ethernet-Like' wireless media such as IEEE 802.11, Bluetooth and other future wireless media based IEEE 802.3. This draft defines a simple protocol to support ROHC over Wireless Ethernet Media (ROHCoWEM).
